description._content: Image taken from: Title: "Relics from the wreck of a former world; or Splinters gathered on the shores of a turbulent Planet; proving the vast antiquity, and the existence of animal life before the appearance of Man. With an appendix on the scenery in a patch of infinite space. To which is added, accounts of the most wonderful bodies that have fallen from Heaven" Shelfmark: "British Library HMNTS 1254.f.31." Page: 35 Place of Publishing: New York Date of Publishing: 1847 Issuance: monographic Identifier: 003070725 Note: The colours, contrast and appearance of these illustrations are unlikely to be true to life. They are derived from scanned images that have been enhanced for machine interpretation and have been altered from their originals.
